h1_title: Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough
content: When he’s finally out of health, the battle will be won, and the Yellow Wind Sage will valiantly land the final blow. It’s a shame we’ll have to beat him up in the future. For your part in the battle, you’ll earn a Sky-Piercing Horn weapon material, and a new Vessel: The Wind Tamer!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2_Secret-Kingdom_of_Sahali_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secret - Kingdom of Sahali Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Fuban'.
The content is as follows:
When he’s finally out of health, the battle will be won, and the Yellow Wind Sage will valiantly land the final blow. It’s a shame we’ll have to beat him up in the future. For your part in the battle, you’ll earn a Sky-Piercing Horn weapon material, and a new Vessel: The Wind Tamer!
